name: YUGANTRAN Tech Fest
description: Annual technical fest featuring coding competitions, robotics challenges, hackathons, project exhibitions, and technical paper presentations. Organized by School of Engineering to promote innovation and technical excellence among students.

name: SANGRILA Annual Cultural Fest
description: A grand cultural extravaganza with dance, music, drama, fashion shows, and star nights. Themed 'One Stage, Infinite Stories', this fest celebrates creativity and artistic expression with performances, competitions, and celebrity appearances.

name: NEXHACK Annual Hackathon
description: 24-hour intensive coding marathon where students collaborate to solve real-world problems using cutting-edge technology. Participants develop innovative solutions with mentorship from industry experts and compete for prizes.

name: Annual Sports Meet
description: Inter-departmental sports competitions celebrating sportsmanship and physical fitness. Includes cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, athletics, and indoor games with trophies for winners across various categories.

name: Bizz Fiesta
description: Business and management fest celebrating Creativity, Strategy & Success. Features case study competitions, business plan presentations, marketing challenges, and leadership workshops. Organized by School of Management.

name: Fresher's Welcome Party
description: Grand welcome celebration for new students featuring artist performances, cultural shows, and entertainment programs. Helps freshers integrate into campus life and build connections with seniors and faculty.

name: Moot Court Competitions
description: Mock trial competitions for law students to practice courtroom procedures, legal argumentation, and advocacy skills. Organized by Geeta Global Law School with participation from regional colleges.

name: Industrial Visits
description: Regular visits to corporate offices, manufacturing units, research labs, and industry facilities. Provides practical exposure and insights into real-world applications of academic learning across all disciplines.

name: Guest Lectures and Seminars
description: Regular sessions with industry experts, alumni, and distinguished professionals sharing insights on latest trends, career opportunities, and emerging technologies. Keeps students updated with current industry demands.

name: Clubs and Societies
description: Multiple student-run clubs including Dance Club, Sur Sangam (Singing Club), Creative Arts Club, Sports Club, Literary Club, HR Club, and Technical Clubs. Regular meetings, workshops, and events throughout the year.
